data.lyric:
[ti:Arcade (Acoustic)]
[ar:Duncan Laurence]
[al:Daydreaming (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Arcade (Acoustic) - Duncan Laurence
[00:04.74]Lyrics by：Duncan Laurence/Wouter Hardy/Joel Sjöö/Will Knox
[00:09.48]Composed by：Duncan Laurence/Wouter Hardy/Joel Sjöö/Will Knox
[00:14.23]A broken heart is all that's left
[00:17.51]
[00:19.77]I'm still fixing all the cracks
[00:22.96]
[00:24.81]Lost a couple of pieces when
[00:28.35]
[00:29.75]I carried it carried it carried it home
[00:34.16]
[00:35.57]I'm afraid of all I am
[00:39.01]
[00:40.62]My mind feels like a foreign land
[00:44.43]
[00:46.01]Silence ringing inside my head
[00:50.06]
[00:50.89]Please carry me carry me carry me home
[00:55.29]
[00:56.68]I've spent all of the love I saved
[01:00.64]We were always a losing game
[01:03.70]Small-town boy in a big arcade
[01:07.57]I got addicted to a losing game
[01:10.71]Ooh ooh
[01:16.89]All I know all I know
[01:21.26]Loving you is a losing game
[01:24.82]
[01:26.74]How many pennies in the slot
[01:30.10]
[01:31.75]Giving us up didn't take a lot
[01:35.24]
[01:37.22]I saw the end 'fore it begun
[01:40.78]
[01:41.99]Still I carried I carried I carry on
[01:46.02]
[01:47.89]Ooh ooh
[01:53.93]All I know all I know
[01:58.34]Loving you is a losing game
[02:02.00]Ooh ooh
[02:08.02]All I know all I know
[02:12.47]Loving you is a losing game
[02:16.06]
[02:16.85]I don't need your games game over
[02:19.57]
[02:23.90]Get me off this rollercoaster
[02:28.70]
[02:30.14]Ooh ooh
[02:36.35]All I know all I know
[02:40.97]
[02:44.19]Ooh ooh
[02:50.42]All I know all I know
[02:54.81]Loving you is a losing game
[02:58.45]
[03:00.21]Ooh-ooh-ooh ooh-ooh ooh-ooh
[03:03.74]
[03:07.33]Ooh-ooh-ooh ooh-ooh ooh-ooh
